name: Gorgon (Greek)
description: The gorgons appear as ageless women with snakes in place of hair, their skin gray-green and cracked. Already dangerous, they are also wrapped in such sacred majesty that any mortal who looks on one turns to stone.

abilities.name: Petrifying Gaze
abilities.description: As an action, may make an opposed Cool versus Coordination check targeting one character within medium range to immobilize the target until the end of this character's next turn, plus one additional turn for each :success::success:; may spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: to stagger target until the end of this character's next turn and may spend :triumph: to turn target to stone

name: Jinn (Arabian)
description: Beings of smokeless fire, jinn are spirits in Arabian myth. They often appear as an upper torso or disembodied head dissolving into colored fumes below the belt or neck. Jinn are nearly immune to conventional weapons, and they can wield dangerous magics.

abilities.name: Spells (Arcana)
abilities.description: This character may choose any magic action allowed for by the Divine skill, and may select additional spell effects, as normal. The spell they use most often is the following unique spell.

abilities.name: Spells: Eye of the Jinn
abilities.description: This character chooses one target within medium range and makes an :average: Divine check; if the check is successful, until the end of this character’s next turn, after the target makes a check, this character may choose one type of die in the pool and reroll all of the dice of that type; can sustain the effects of this spell by performing a concentrate maneuver

name: Korrigan (Breton)
description: In the dark, korrigan are ethereal, dancing around fountains and at crossroads. They delight in luring travelers into their dance, until their victims die of exhaustion. In daylight, their true shape is revealed: hunched and withered humanoids with red eyes and tangled white hair.

abilities.name: Moonlit Glamor
abilities.description: During the night, this character's presence is 5 instead of 1

abilities.name: Spells (Primal)
abilities.description: This character may choose any magic action allowed for by the Primal skill, and may select additional spell effects, as normal. The spell they use most often is the following unique spell.

abilities.name: Spells: Endless Dance
abilities.description: This character chooses one target within short range and makes an :average:  Primal check; upon success, the target is immobilized, suffers 1 strain and 1 wound at the start of their turn, and adds :setback::setback: to all checks they make; on their turn, the target may make a :daunting: Discipline or Resilience check to end these effects; can sustain the effects of this spell by performing the concentrate maneuver

gear: Piles of leaves or twine that appear to be valuable

name: Minotaur (Greek)
description: The minotaur is a monstrous abomination who is half-man, half bull. The original minotaur lived in a labyrinth on Crete, eating all who were exiled into the maze. Though this monster was slain by Theseus, who knows if others lurk in the lightless corners of the earth?

abilities.name: Gore
abilities.description: After making a successful combat check using its vicious axe, this character may spend :advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to inflict one hit with its bloody horns on the target or another target this character is engaged with, dealing base damage +1 damage per :success:

name: Siren (Greek)
description: These beings look like captivating women perched on rocks and treacherous shores, singing with great (and supernatural) skill to lure sailors to their deaths.

abilities.name: Siren's Song
abilities.description: This character may make an opposed Charm versus Discipline check targeting one character within long range; if successful, the target must spend all of its available maneuvers [including spending an action to gain a second maneuver or suffering strain] to move into engaged range, and the target may not make combat checks targeting this character until after this character makes a combat check targeting them

talents.name: Natural
talents.description: Once per session, use this talent to reroll any one  Negotiation or Skulduggery check.

abilities.name: Local Politics
abilities.description: Once per session, may choose one character operating in their area of influence (community, precinct, or county, for example); until the end of the session, the target must upgrade the difficulty of any social skill checks they make to interact with inhabitants of this area once.

talents.name: Natural
talents.description: Once per session, use this talent to reroll any one  Skulduggery or Stealth check.

abilities.name: One Step Ahead
abilities.description: Once per round, after an opponent performs an action or maneuver, may spend one Story Point to perform an action or a maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental.

name: Local Official

abilities.name: Good at Needling
abilities.description: If this character knows an opponent’s Flaw Motivation, when this character inflicts strain on the opponent, the opponent suffers 4 additional strain.

gear: Fine clothing, official credentials or badge of office

abilities.name: Evolutionary Niche
abilities.description: Before using this character, choose one of the following abilities: Arthropod: Has a thick exoskeleton and adds +2 to its soak value, Aquatic: Never treats water as difficult terrain and can breathe underwater, Arboreal: Treats vertical surfaces and forested areas as normal terrain, or Avian: May fly, as per page 100 of the Genesys Core Rulebook.

abilities.name: Flames of Fury
abilities.description: Increase the damage of a thrown torch by +1 for each additional minion in this minion group, to a maximum of +7

abilities.name: Unnatural Resilience
abilities.description: After suffering a Critical Injury, may spend one Story Point to reduce the Critical Injury result by -50; if this reduces the Critical Injury result to less than 01, the failed experiment does not suffer a Critical Injury.

abilities.name: We Belong Dead
abilities.description: Characters targeting this character with a social skill check suffer 3 strain.

abilities.name: Bite of the Wolf
abilities.description: When a feral lycanthrope in their animal form makes an unarmed attack and inflicts a Critical Injury result of 51 or higher on a human PC or human nemesis NPC [your GM has final say on what counts as human], the character gains the Bite of the Wolf and Call of the Moon abilities [if the target is a PC, use the abilities listed in the cursed shifter archetype found on page 20 instead]).

abilities.name: Call of the Moon
abilities.description: When the full moon rises, this character transforms into a monstrous wolf or giant hunting cat as an out-of-turn incidental; they heal all strain they are currently suffering, increase their Brawn and Agility by one to a maximum of 5, and reduce their Intellect and Willpower by one to a minimum of 1; all opponents must halve the damage dealt to this character while transformed before applying soak, unless their weapon is made of silver or uses silver ammunition; the transformation lasts until the following dawn or until this character is incapacitated due to exceeding their wound threshold.

abilities.name: Heart of Darkness
abilities.description: Once per session, spend a Story Point to have this character transform, no matter the circumstances; the transformation lasts until the following dawn.

name: Mad Scientist

abilities.name: Arterial Strike
abilities.description: When this character inflicts a Critical Injury with a Melee combat check, spend a Story Point to inflict the Bleeding Out Critical Injury in-stead of rolling a result.

abilities.name: Master of the Lightning
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may make a :hard: Knowledge (Science) check as an action; if successful, one target within long range suffers 10 damage to their strain threshold (+1 damage per :success:) and a Critical Injury; may spend :advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to inflict the same damage and a Critical Injury on an additional target within long range.

abilities.name: They Dare Call Me Mad?
abilities.description: Characters targeting this character with a social skill check suffer 2 strain).

gear: Notebook filled with results of forbidden experiments

abilities.name: Magical Reanimation
abilities.description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink; immune to poisons and toxins

abilities.name: Vulnerable to Fire
abilities.description: Hits from fire or a weapon with the Burn item quality ignore this character’s soak.

name: Vampire

abilities.name: Blood Call
abilities.description: When this character inflicts wounds on a target using their fangs, they heal 4 strain and 4 wounds.

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
abilities.description: While exposed to direct sunlight, this character halves their strain threshold and wound threshold.

abilities.name: Undead
abilities.description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink [except blood], can survive underwater, and is immune to poisons and toxins.

abilities.name: Vulnerable Heart
abilities.description: When this character suffers a Critical Injury from a weapon made of wood, such as a stake or crossbow bolt, they add +40 to the Critical Injury result.

gear: Ancient but well-preserved clothing, deeds to assorted estates

abilities.name: Jack of All Trades
abilities.description: Once per session, may spend a Story Point to increase ranks in one skill by two for the remainder of the encounter.

abilities.name: Radioactive
abilities.description: At the end of an encounter in which a target was hit by a combat check from this character, that target must make a :hard: Resilience check or suffer one level of radiation (See A Certain Glow, EPG page 29).

abilities.name: Death Roll
abilities.description: When this character makes a successful Brawl combat check against an immobilized target, it may inflict a Critical Injury without spending :advantage: or :triumph:; it may still spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to add +10 to the results.

abilities.name: Eight-legged
abilities.description: Cannot be knocked prone or immobilized.

name: Warlord

abilities.name: Might Makes Right
abilities.description: After this character inflicts a Critical Injury, decrease the difficulty of all Coercion and Leadership checks they make by one, to a minimum of :easy:, until the end of the encounter; this ability may be triggered multiple times).

abilities.name: …And I’m Always Right
abilities.description: May make a :hard: Leadership check; if successful, allies within medium range may perform a second maneuver during their turn without suffering strain; this character may spend :advantage: to increase the damage of affected allies’ attacks by an amount equal to the :advantage: spent; both of these effects last until the end of this character’s next turn.

weapons.name: Aluminum bat wrapped in barbed wire

gear: Spiky armor: +2 soak, when targeted by a melee combat check, may spend :threat::threat: or :despair: to have the attacker suffer 2 wounds.

abilities.name: Ambush Predator
abilities.description: When attacking a target that has not yet acted during the current encounter, this creature adds :boost::boost: to its combat checks.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Once per turn, while at short range this creature may perform a move maneuver to engage a target as an incidental.

abilities.name: Pack Fighter
abilities.description: If this creature makes a successful combat check, the next ally making a combat check against the same target during the same round adds :advantage::advantage: to the results.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: After making a combat check, this creature may spend :triumph: to move the target up to short range, inflict 4 strain, and knock the target prone.

abilities.name: Crush
abilities.description: While engaged with a vehicle, this creature may make a :hard: Athletics check as an action; if the check is successful, the vehicle suffers a Critical Hit and may not move during the following round.

abilities.name: Multitentacled
abilities.description: After making a successful combat check, this creature may spend 3 strain to inflict one additional hit with its thrashing tentacles against one other target within short range that is no more difficult to hit than original target, dealing base damage +1 per :success:; it may do so up to three times.

abilities.name: Neurotoxin
abilities.description: If this creature inflicts wounds with a combat check, the target must make a :hard: Resilience check; upon failure, the target suffers 5 wounds, plus 1 strain per :threat:; :despair: means the target must make another Resilience check at the same difficulty at the start of their next turn or suffer the same effects.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.description: When this creature's minion group consists of at least two minions and is engaged with a target, they can spend a maneuver to prevent the target from disengaging from the minion group until the end of their next turn and to add :advantage::advantage: to their next combat check against that target.

abilities.name: Take a Breath
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may suffer 2 strain as an out-of-turn incidental during an ally’s turn; the ally loses a maneuver and either heals 6 strain or may reroll a fear check they just failed.

name: Blueblood

abilities.name: Let Me Get You Something
abilities.description: Once per encounter, this character may give another character 100 currency to downgrade the difficulty of the next social check they make targeting that character.

gear: Formal clothing, expensive jewelry, unlimited funds

abilities.name: Time to Heal
abilities.description: If this character is caring for a character who is benefiting from natural rest, the resting character heals 2 wounds each night and decreases the difficulty of any Resilience checks they make to heal Critical Injuries by 1, to a minimum of :easy:.

abilities.name: Many Hands Make Light the Load
abilities.description: If this character provides assistance when another character makes a Mechanics check to repair a vehicle, increase the hull trauma or system strain repaired by 2; if the check is being made to repair a Critical Hit, reduce the difficulty of the check by 1, to a minimum of :easy:; this is in addition to the other benefits of assistance.

abilities.name: Let’s Make a Deal
abilities.description: If this character knows an opponent’s Desire Motivation, when this character inflicts strain on the opponent, the opponent suffers 4 additional strain.

name: Paper Pusher

abilities.name: Red Tape
abilities.description: Once per encounter, as an action, make an opposed Knowledge versus Cool check targeting one character in the encounter; if successful, the target increases the difficulty of all social skill checks they make by two, to a maximum of :formidable:, until the end of the encounter.

gear: Attire appropriate to the place of work

abilities.name: Been There, Done That
abilities.description: When providing assistance, this character adds :success::advantage: to the results in-stead of :boost:)

abilities.name: Momentum
abilities.description: If this character performed a move maneuver, they add 3 to the damage of one hit of any successful Brawl or Melee combat checks they make during the same turn.

abilities.name: Strategic Coordination
abilities.description: Once per encounter, may make a :daunting: Leadership check; if successful, until the end of the encounter, all allies in the encounter may perform an additional move maneuver on their turn without downgrading their action or suffering strain—but they still may only perform two maneuvers during their turn.

name: Medic
gear: Medical supplies (can make Medicine checks without penalty)

abilities.name: Destroy Terrain
abilities.description: When engaged with a silhouette 2 or smaller terrain feature that is providing cover or obstructs movement—such as a section of fence, foxhole, door, or sandbagged emplacement—this character may spend an action and make a :hard: Mechanics check; if the check succeeds the terrain feature is destroyed and no longer provides cover or obstructs movement.

abilities.name: Flush Target
abilities.description: After making a combat check targeting a character in cover, may spend :advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to force the character to immediately move out of cover as an out-of-turn incidental.
